Aiming For Your Success

Fast

Griffith Ventures was established with a goal to provide support in the easiest and quickest way possible. With years of entrepreneurial experience under our belts, we are fast to recognize the promise and provide you with full financial, and advisory support. With the benefits brought to you by our web of investors, you will always be one step ahead.

Powerful

We have used our experience to create a powerful model to make smarter co-investment decisions. With a worldwide network of investors, we are committed to expanding the development and adoption of innovative technologies through early-stage investments, advisory services, markets, and trading.

Experienced

Griffith Ventures was founded and is led by a skilled team with years of entrepreneurial, research, technological development and investment experience. Our management strength in predictive analytics helps us to recognize the most profitable and promising investment.

Our Investment Process

Project Analysis

We collect the information and analyze it according to today’s market and demand.

Technology Diligence

We conduct a thorough external technical diligence validation.

Investment Process

If passed all steps, we help your business start growing right from the bat.

Why Us?

Personal Experienced Approach

We treat every project as our own, and every client as our friend. Being directed at long-term cooperation and strong relationships with our clients, we put to work 10+ professional experience in varying spheres, from investments and banks, to market knowledge and finances.

Transparency

We work independently and transparently, letting you follow every step of the way. We consult you and explain every little detail in order to make sure you realize what’s best for your business and project.

Strong Network

Gained over the years of work, we have an extensive network of investors and partners across the globe. We touch over 100 companies and entrepreneurs in the blockchain sector only, with many more partners from other spheres.

Our Expertise

Analytics & Consultancy

We are happy to share our knowledge and experience with our clients: we provide market insights, detailed analytics of the given project, growth strategies, legal consultancy and more.

Capital support

Griffith Ventures is a strong network of investors, ready to help with growing the riskiest and most groundbreaking ideas out there. We are flexible with respect to stage, asset type, and geography.

Community events

We love helping our clients host events. In our portfolio regular conferences, community happy hours, protocol meetups and more!
